ygData.subject: RE: SG Guild Suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks...I guess I do need a robe, eh? *heh* BTW, our Stein quest is proceeding on schedule, with one minor hiccup. It seems that almost all the components
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
> Kell will be the taker.

Thanks...I guess I do need a robe, eh? *heh*

BTW, our Stein quest is proceeding on schedule, with one minor
hiccup. It seems that almost all the components required are lore
items, and thus we cannot hold extra components for kakis. Some
of us have already created "dummy" characters, so at most we can
hold one more set of components each.

Anyone wishing to be the proud owner of a Stein of Moggok had
better contact us soon...





--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor

Praetor@...
